Object.Name: Three-phase electrical meter complement
Object.Description1: The uCIFI three-phase electrical meter complement gathers all the measures, events, threshold and other resources required to create a full three-phase electrical meter together with three additional uCIFI single-phase electrical meters.

Item.Name: L1-L2 Voltage
Item.Description: Voltage measured between line 1 and line 2.

Item.Name: L2-L3 Voltage
Item.Description: Voltage measured between line 2 and line 3.

Item.Name: L3-L1 Voltage
Item.Description: Voltage measured between line 3 and line 1.

Item.Name: Total Current of all three phases
Item.Description: Sum of current measured on all three lines.

Item.Name: Instantaneous Power Factor overall
Item.Description: Instantaneous power factor overall.

Item.Name: Last Average Power Factor
Item.Description: Last average power factor calculated from each power factor on the 3 lines.

Item.Name: Minimum Power Factor
Item.Description: Minimum power factor measured on the 3 lines.

Item.Name: Total active power import on the 3 lines
Item.Description: System W: Inst. Value. Sum Li Active power+ (QI+QIV).

Item.Name: Total active power export on the 3 lines
Item.Description: System W: Inst. Value. Sum Li Active power- (QII+QIII).

Item.Name: Total reactive power import on the 3 lines
Item.Description: System var: Inst. Value. Sum Li Reactive power+ (QI+QII).

Item.Name: Total reactive power export on the 3 lines
Item.Description: System var: Inst. Value. Sum Li Reactive power- (QIII+QIV).

Item.Name: Instantaneous Apparent Power import
Item.Description: Instantaneous apparent power import on the 3 lines (+VA).

Item.Name: Instantaneous Apparent Power export
Item.Description: Instantaneous apparent power export on the 3 lines (-VA).

Item.Name: Instantaneous Active Power
Item.Description: Instantaneous active power on the 3 lines (|+A|+|-A|).

Item.Name: Instantaneous Net Active Power
Item.Description: Instantaneous net active power on the 3 lines (|+A|-|-A|).

Item.Name: Measurement period of Instantaneous value
Item.Description: Measurement period of instantaneous value.

Item.Description: Active energy export (unified rate) on the 3 lines (-A).

Item.Description: Active energy, combined total, import plus export (|+A|+|-A|).

Item.Name: Active energy Combined total (-export)

Item.Name: Reactive energy import Un
Item.Description: Reactive energy import, unified rate, on the 3 lines (+R).

Item.Name: Reactive energy export Un
Item.Description: Reactive energy export, unified rate, on the 3 lines (-R).

Item.Name: Reactive energy QI Un
Item.Description: Reactive energy QI, unified rate, on the 3 lines (+Ri).

Item.Name: Reactive energy QII Un
Item.Description: Reactive energy QII, unified rate, on the 3 lines (+Rc).

Item.Name: Reactive energy QIII Un
Item.Description: Reactive energy QIII, unified rate, on the 3 lines (-Ri).

Item.Name: Reactive energy QIV Un
Item.Description: Reactive energy QIV, unified rate, on the 3 lines (-Rc).

Item.Name: Apparent energy import Un
Item.Description: Apparent energy import, unified rate, on the 3 lines.

Item.Name: Apparent energy export Un
Item.Description: Apparent energy export, unified rate, on the 3 lines.

Item.Name: Number of power failures in any phase
Item.Description: Number of power failures in any phase

Item.Name: Number of long power failures in any phase
Item.Description: Number of long power failures in any phase.

Item.Name: Time threshold for long power failure
Item.Description: Time threshold for long power failure.

Item.Name: Duration of last long power failure in any phase
Item.Description: Duration of last long power failure in any phase.

Item.Name: Threshold for missing voltage (voltage cut)
Item.Description: Threshold for missing voltage (voltage cut).

Item.Name: Time threshold for voltage cut
Item.Description: Time threshold for voltage cut.

Item.Name: Voltage cut
Item.Description: Set to True if a voltage cut for a time above the time threshold and for a voltage below the voltage threshold is detected.

Item.Name: L1 Meter Instance
Item.Description: Instance number of the Single-phase electrical meter associated to line 1

Item.Name: L2 Meter Instance
Item.Description: Instance number of the Single-phase electrical meter associated to line 2

Item.Name: L3 Meter Instance
Item.Description: Instance number of the Single-phase electrical meter associated to line 3

Item.Name: Low power factor threshold
Item.Description: Threshold below which the low power factor resource is set to True.

Item.Name: Low power factor
Item.Description: Set to True when the overall power factor is below low power factor threshold.

Item.Name: Excessive load
Item.Description: True if an excessive load is detected, e.g when too much current is being imported

Item.Name: Unexpected load
Item.Description: True if an unexpected load is detected, e.g when current is imported despite the load being supposed to be disconnected

Item.Name: Timestamp
Item.Description: The timestamp of when the measurement was performed.

Item.Name: Fractional Timestamp
Item.Description: Fractional part of the timestamp when sub-second precision is used (e.g., 0.23 for 230 ms).

Item.Name: Measurement Quality Indicator
Item.Description: Measurement quality indicator reported by a smart sensor. 0: UNCHECKED No quality checks were done because they do not exist or can not be applied. 1: REJECTED WITH CERTAINTY The measured value is invalid. 2: REJECTED WITH PROBABILITY The measured value is likely invalid. 3: ACCEPTED BUT SUSPICIOUS The measured value is likely OK. 4: ACCEPTED The measured value is OK. 5-15: Reserved for future extensions. 16-23: Vendor specific measurement quality.

Item.Name: Measurement Quality Level
Item.Description: Measurement quality level reported by a smart sensor. Quality level 100 means that the measurement has fully passed quality check algorithms. Smaller quality levels mean that quality has decreased and the measurement has only partially passed quality check algorithms. The smaller the quality level, the more caution should be used by the application when using the measurement. When the quality level is 0 it means that the measurement should certainly be rejected.
